EmailTemplate.subject: You're Confirmed
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for registering for the Pivotal Cybersecurity Analytics Workshop: Cybersecurity Analytics at Scale. Please see event details below:
Date: Wednesday, October 19, 2016 Time: 12:00 pm - 3:00 pm
Location: Pivotal Toronto, 1 Toronto Street (King and Church), 11th Floor Reception
{{my.Save the Date}}
Questions? Please contact Louis Lo at llo@pivotal.io <[[mailto:llo@pivotal.io]]>.
The Pivotal Team
